name: AS_GCM_QNM_getPossibleActivePrecedentQuestions
description: Returns all the possible active questions for an questionnnaire
sail_code:
/* To be a precedent for question A, question B must...
be in the same category
have a selection based field
not already be in the follow up question chain of question A */
cast(
  #"urn:appian:function:v1:a:listtype?okey=a!listType"(
    recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question
  ),
  rule!AS_GAM_filterCdtOrRecordDataByField(
    cdtOrRecord: filter(
      rule!AS_GCM_QNM_UT_containsSelectionBasedField(question: _),
      rule!AS_GAM_rejectCdtOrRecordDataByField(
        cdtOrRecord: ri!allQuestions,
        field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionTemplateId,
        value: append(
          ri!question[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionTemplateId],
          rule!AS_GCM_QNM_UT_retrieveAllFollowUpQuestions(
            question: ri!question,
            allQuestions: ri!allQuestions
          )[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionTemplateId]
        )
      )
    ),
    field: recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionCategoryTemplateId,
    value: ri!question[recordType!AS GCM QNM T Question.questionCategoryTemplateId]
  )
)
